text: Philipp Jenninger (10 June 1932 – 4 January 2018) was a German politician. He was a member of the Christian Democratic Union and diplomat. Jenninger was the President of the Bundestag from 1984 to 1988. He also served as Member of the German Parliament, the Bundestag (1969–1990), Minister of State at the German Chancellery (1982–1984), German Ambassador to Austria (1991–1995) and German Ambassador to the Holy See (1995–1997). Jenninger died on 4 January 2018 in Stuttgart, aged 85. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Members of the German Bundestag Category:Ambassadors of Germany Category:Politicians from Baden-Württemberg Category:Politicians of the Christian Democratic Union of Germany Category:Heads of the German Chancellery
title: Philipp Jenninger
